column2: 1 Strain Gauge Load Sensor; two 5.1 kOhm resistors; 1 INA125P Instrumentation Amplifier; 1 Multimeter; one 1 kOhm resistor
1. Connect load sensor and two 5.1 kOhm resistors as a Wheatstone bridge
2. Connect Excitation points of Wheatstone bridge as inputs to INA125P In-Amp with 1 kOhm resistor as gain
3. Measure INA125P output upon applying various levels of force to the load sensor.
Steady increase in output of ~0.1 V per 10kg applied force with minimal amount of noise
